original_text: You have heard me tell you about God's true message. Let those words be an example to you, so that you also teach what is true. Do this because you belong to Christ Jesus. Continue to trust him and to love his people.
korean_text: 너는 그리스도 예수 안에 있는 믿음과 사랑으로써 내게 들은 바 바른 말을 본받아 지키고

sentences.original_text: You have heard me tell you
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 내가 너에게 말한 것을 들었느니라

sentences.original_text: Let those words be an example to you,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 말씀이 너에게 본이 되게 하라,

sentences.original_text: so that you also teach what is true.
sentences.korean_translation: 너도 참된 것을 가르치게 하려 함이라.

sentences.original_text: Do this because you belong to Christ Jesus.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그리스도 예수에게 속하였으니 이것을 행하라.
